paragraphs.text: Obama hands Cuba's Castros a major victory, but Congress can still stop it.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: Establishing ties with Cuba has been on President Obama's bucket list for some time
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Health care
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: done
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Amnesty for illegal immigrants
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: done
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Cuba -- next
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: This last one also has the added bonus point that it puts him right with the international left
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: which lionizes Castro
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: And the president will go on picking off the next items on the bucket list for the next two years of his term unless Congress decides to stop him
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Should they work up the gumption
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: lawmakers will find they can do many things to stand up for the prerogatives of the legislative branch
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Obviously, the release of the 65-year-old American hostage Alan Gross should be welcome
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: His "crime" was to bring computers to Jews on the island
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: For the last five years, he has been a victim of Cuba's state terrorism
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: just as 11 million Cubans have been held hostage by their government for the past five decades
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Exchanging three hardened Cuban spies for Gross, however
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: establishes an insulting moral and legal equivalency
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The spies actions led to the death of an American in the 1990s
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: they were duly convicted
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Their release in exchange for Gross creates an incentive for rogue regimes and individual actors to kidnap Americans all over the world
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Not only does President Obama's action fail to advance freedom in Cuba
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: it throws a lifeline to Cuba's dictators
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: whose current supplier of funds, Venezuela, is on the ropes because of plunging oil prices
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It surrenders to the demands for normalization that the Castros have been making for decades
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: So what can Congress do?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Right off the bat, Congress must make it crystal clear to President Obama that he lacks the authority to lift the embargo on Cuba, allow trade to take place between the two nations, let tourists to go to Cuba to bail out the regime or give Cuba have access to capital markets
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: U.S  law--the Helms-Burton Act of 1996--gives the Congress power to override any action taken by the executive to lift the embargo
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In order to lift the embargo, the Cuban government would have to give the Cuban people a number of rights--of association, speech, political activity, etc
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: that President Obama obviously failed to secure in his 45-minute conversation with Cuban dictator Raul Castro Tuesday
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Congress can also make clear to the president that there are statutory criteria that must be met
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: before his administration can take Cuba off the State Department list of terrorism sponsors
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The president must inform Congress that there has been a change of leadership and policies of the Cuban government and that Castro has given assurances that it will no longer support terrorist acts
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Can President Obama do any of that?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Senators should also make clear that they will put a hold on any ambassador that Mr  Obama nominates to serve in Cuba
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: unless
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: he can guarantee that the Cuban government is no longer a threat to the United States and has decided to grant freedom to people in Cuba
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Sen  Marco Rubio, R-Fla , has already said he plans to do that
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: Additionally
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Congress can look into the possibility of using policy riders in the upcoming DHS appropriations debate in February and the Fiscal Year 2016 appropriations process to deny the president funds for setting up relations
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Congress must act
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: because President Obama has been completely feckless in his entire approach to Cuba
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: He received nothing in exchange for many substantial concessions made to the Communist regime
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: After five years of "negotiations" President Obama ended exactly where Raul Castro's demands began five years ago
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As Senator Marco Rubio said, President "Obama is the worst negotiator since Carter."
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: Mr  Obama's statement was filled with Havana's communist talking points, such as affirming that Cubans are poor and unfree because of the embargo, or that Cuba was a U.S  colony
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: None of that is true
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: yet Mr  Obama said it
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Congress must act to limit the damage inherent in this Havana Giveaway
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Left
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: unchecked
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Obama will simply move on to the next misguided item on his bucket list
paragraphs.label: assumption
